<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Prismatic Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=232)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 359 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=9)

**Deity**
[The Last Breath](/Deities.aspx?ID=270)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 10 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You create a seven-layered sphere to protect an area. This multicolored sphere functions like a [_prismatic wall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=234) but is shaped in a 10-foot burst centered on a corner of your space. You must form the sphere in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost.
name: Prismatic Sphere
